title: 87x14: Applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207 to a Former Agency Employee
summary: OGE discusses the applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207 to a former employee's proposed employment as the manager of the communications services facility of an agency contractor. Because more than two years had passed since the former employee's resignation from the agency, the only applicable provision was 18 U.S.C. § 207(a).
